flawed_nl_solution:
Ali made 5 circles with 8 boxes each so he used 5*8 = <<5*8=40>>40 boxes
There were 80 boxes to start with so now there are 80-40 = <<80-40=30>>30 boxes left
Ernie used 10 boxes to make one circle so with 30 boxes he can make 30/10 = <<30/10=3>>3 circles
#### 3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 30. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
